issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: This issue is undergoing QA.  See linked QA issue(s) for progress.
status.name: In QA

fields.description:
The following error was seen in the error log on the cloud controller:

{code}
2017-03-24 15:15:00 ERROR | Error processing fired timer: b104317e-42fe-49de-847a-3e4f4a66b704/164
java.util.NoSuchElementException: @Id: 8aef85385b0233a0015b026208c7058f
        at com.eucalyptus.entities.Entities.maybePrimaryKey(Entities.java:841)
        at com.eucalyptus.entities.Entities.uniqueResult(Entities.java:762)
        at com.eucalyptus.entities.Transactions$4.call(Transactions.java:471)
        at com.eucalyptus.entities.Transactions.one(Transactions.java:514)
        at com.eucalyptus.entities.Transactions.one(Transactions.java:505)
        at com.eucalyptus.entities.Transactions.one(Transactions.java:468)
        at com.eucalyptus.entities.Transactions.one(Transactions.java:461)
        at com.eucalyptus.entities.AbstractPersistentSupport.updateByExample(AbstractPersistentSupport.java:169)
 [wrapped] com.eucalyptus.simpleworkflow.SwfMetadataNotFoundException: Unable to find timer '28' for arn:aws:euare::000217449631:user/admin
        at com.eucalyptus.simpleworkflow.persist.SwfPersistenceSupport.notFoundException(SwfPersistenceSupport.java:45)
        at com.eucalyptus.simpleworkflow.persist.SwfPersistenceSupport.notFoundException(SwfPersistenceSupport.java:31)
        at com.eucalyptus.entities.AbstractPersistentSupport.updateByExample(AbstractPersistentSupport.java:171)
        at com.eucalyptus.simpleworkflow.persist.PersistenceTimers.updateByExample(PersistenceTimers.java:38)
        at com.eucalyptus.simpleworkflow.stateful.TimeoutManager$1.apply(TimeoutManager.java:116)
 [wrapped] java.lang.RuntimeException: Unable to find timer '28' for arn:aws:euare::000217449631:user/admin
        at com.eucalyptus.util.Exceptions.toUndeclared(Exceptions.java:259)
        at com.eucalyptus.util.Exceptions.toUndeclared(Exceptions.java:265)
        at com.eucalyptus.simpleworkflow.stateful.TimeoutManager$1.apply(TimeoutManager.java:148)
        at com.eucalyptus.simpleworkflow.stateful.TimeoutManager$1.apply(TimeoutManager.java:111)
        at com.eucalyptus.entities.Transactions.one(Transactions.java:519)
 [wrapped] com.eucalyptus.entities.TransactionCallbackException: java.lang.RuntimeException: Unable to find timer '28' for arn:aws:euare::000217449631:user/admin
        at com.eucalyptus.entities.Transactions.one(Transactions.java:523)
        at com.eucalyptus.entities.Transactions.one(Transactions.java:505)
        at com.eucalyptus.entities.Transactions.one(Transactions.java:468)
        at com.eucalyptus.entities.Transactions.one(Transactions.java:461)
        at com.eucalyptus.entities.AbstractPersistentSupport.updateByExample(AbstractPersistentSupport.java:169)
 [wrapped] com.eucalyptus.simpleworkflow.SwfMetadataException: Error updating workflow-execution 'b104317e-42fe-49de-847a-3e4f4a66b704' for arn:aws:euare::000217449631:user/admin
        at com.eucalyptus.simpleworkflow.persist.SwfPersistenceSupport.metadataException(SwfPersistenceSupport.java:50)
        at com.eucalyptus.simpleworkflow.persist.SwfPersistenceSupport.metadataException(SwfPersistenceSupport.java:31)
        at com.eucalyptus.entities.AbstractPersistentSupport.updateByExample(AbstractPersistentSupport.java:173)
        at com.eucalyptus.entities.AbstractPersistentSupport$DelegatingAbstractPersistentSupport.updateByExample(AbstractPersistentSupport.java:448)
        at com.eucalyptus.entities.AbstractPersistentSupport$RetryingAbstractPersistentSupport.access$201(AbstractPersistentSupport.java:282)
        at com.eucalyptus.entities.AbstractPersistentSupport$RetryingAbstractPersistentSupport$1.apply(AbstractPersistentSupport.java:297)
 [wrapped] java.lang.RuntimeException: Error updating workflow-execution 'b104317e-42fe-49de-847a-3e4f4a66b704' for arn:aws:euare::000217449631:user/admin
        at com.eucalyptus.util.Exceptions.toUndeclared(Exceptions.java:259)
        at com.eucalyptus.util.Exceptions.toUndeclared(Exceptions.java:265)
        at com.eucalyptus.entities.AbstractPersistentSupport$RetryingAbstractPersistentSupport$1.apply(AbstractPersistentSupport.java:299)
        at com.eucalyptus.entities.AbstractPersistentSupport$RetryingAbstractPersistentSupport$1.apply(AbstractPersistentSupport.java:293)
        at com.eucalyptus.entities.Entities$TransactionalFunction.apply(Entities.java:1550)
        at com.eucalyptus.entities.AbstractPersistentSupport$RetryingAbstractPersistentSupport.updateWithRetries(AbstractPersistentSupport.java:376)
 [wrapped] com.eucalyptus.simpleworkflow.SwfMetadataException: Error updating workflow-execution 'b104317e-42fe-49de-847a-3e4f4a66b704' for arn:aws:euare::000217449631:user/admin
        at com.eucalyptus.simpleworkflow.persist.SwfPersistenceSupport.metadataException(SwfPersistenceSupport.java:50)
        at com.eucalyptus.simpleworkflow.persist.SwfPersistenceSupport.metadataException(SwfPersistenceSupport.java:31)
        at com.eucalyptus.entities.AbstractPersistentSupport$DelegatingAbstractPersistentSupport.metadataException(AbstractPersistentSupport.java:489)
        at com.eucalyptus.entities.AbstractPersistentSupport$RetryingAbstractPersistentSupport.updateWithRetries(AbstractPersistentSupport.java:378)
        at com.eucalyptus.entities.AbstractPersistentSupport$RetryingAbstractPersistentSupport.updateByExample(AbstractPersistentSupport.java:293)
        at com.eucalyptus.simpleworkflow.stateful.TimeoutManager.doTimers(TimeoutManager.java:107)
        at com.eucalyptus.simpleworkflow.stateful.TimeoutManager$TimeoutManagerEventListener.fireEvent(TimeoutManager.java:382)
        at com.eucalyptus.simpleworkflow.stateful.TimeoutManager$TimeoutManagerEventListener.fireEvent(TimeoutManager.java:369)
        at com.eucalyptus.event.ListenerRegistry$ReentrantListenerRegistry$1$1$1.call(ListenerRegistry.java:358)
        at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(FutureTask.java:266)
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1142)
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:617)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745)
{code}

we should not log errors when a timer is not found as it is expected that it could be cancelled, etc. A similar issue could occur for processing activity and decision task timeouts which should also be fixed.

This issue does not impact functionality, it is logging only.
fields.summary: SimpleWorkflow: Error logged when processing timer
